author: Reuters Editorial
title: Circassia Pharmaceuticals Names Three Non-Executive Directors ​
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Circassia Pharmaceuticals Plc:
* ‍JO LE COUILLIARD IS APPOINTED AS A NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT.​
* ‍SHARON CURRAN IS APPOINTED AS A NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT​
* ‍HERIBERT STAUDINGER IS APPOINTED AS A NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
